mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user ( email, password, name, birthday, target_company_size, is_deleted, blacklist, profile_img_url, job_detail_code, job_code ) VALUES ( #{email}, #{password}, #{name}, #{birthday}, #{targetCompanySize}, #{isDeleted}, #{blacklist}, #{profileImgUrl}, #{jobDetailCode}, #{jobCode} )
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET created_at = now() WHERE email = #{email}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) > 0 FROM user WHERE email = #{email}
